channel.title: 作品集 on 5rLku

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: 技术美术作品集 Curl-noise 速度场流体 OpenGL .video-shortcode { position: relative; max-width: 90%; height: auto; } There should have been a video here but your browser does not seem to support it. curl-noise 噪声速度场 .video-shortcode { position: relative; max-width: 90%; height: auto; } There should have been a video here but your browser does not seem to support it. curl-noise 障碍球速度场 Perlin Noise 生成 curl-noise 复现论文《Curl-Noise for Procedural Fluid Flow》 对噪声场求其旋度场，该旋度场的散度处处为 0 ，可以模拟流体粒子的流动 对旋度场调制，生成含障碍物的速度场 Houdini .
